name: OpenClaw QQ Plugin
description: QQ channel plugin for OpenClaw via NapCat (OneBot v11)
author: CreatorAris

napcatWs.description: NapCat OneBot v11 WebSocket URL (e.g. ws://127.0.0.1:3001)

botQQ.description: Bot's QQ number, used to filter self-messages in groups

allowedUsers.description: Allowed QQ user IDs for private chat. Empty array = allow all.

allowedGroups.description: Allowed group IDs for group chat. Empty array = disabled.

port.description: HTTP port for proactive /send endpoint (0 = disabled)
